news.title: Laura Murphy speaks out about national day of solidarity with Palestine proposal
news.summary: "Symbolic gestures are no substitute for binding action. To delay is to deepen complicity," Murphy wrote.

news.title: Live Report: Billie Eilish leaves Dublin's 3Arena 'Happier Than Ever'
news.summary: The 23-year-old delivered a spectacular night of contrasts, captivating the crowd with both raw intimacy and explosive energy

news.title: Pillow Queens' Cathy McGuinness and Comerford Handcrafted Guitars team up for raffle in aid of Gaza
news.summary: See details about the raffle below

news.title: South Park viewership surges 258% following Trump episode
news.summary: Recent data from streaming guide JustWatch shows a 258% increase in streaming activity, pushing the long-running animated series to the top of current viewing charts.

news.title: The Boomtown Rats speak out for Gaza at sold-out Swords Castle show
news.summary: "Tonight, we're thinking of those panicked, exhausted mothers and their starving children in Gaza," Bob Geldof told the crowd.

news.title: Live Report: Soda Blonde effortlessly command the Button Factory
news.summary: Dublin heavyweights Soda Blonde launched the vinyl version of their new EP People Pleaser to a sold-out Button Factory on Friday night with a glistening and infinitely memorable show.

news.title: Jock McDonald RIP
news.summary: The punk rock provocateur died over the weekend in a swimming accident in Bundoran, Co. Dinegal

news.title: Throwing Snow & Daragh Fleming - On Our Radar Q&A: "'Pedalling’ is childhood memories and nostalgia, whereas what we’ve been working on recently is dealing with difficult subjects"
news.summary: Producer Ross Tones – aka Throwing Snow – and Daragh Fleming discuss their exhilarating summer dance track, ‘Pedalling’.
